Cybersecurity Fact

About Me

I'm a passionate cybersecurity analyst and full-stack developer currently pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science with Business Systems at VIT-AP University. I specialize in security assessments, penetration testing, and building scalable web applications.

Cybersecurity Analysis

Conducting social engineering simulations and Wi-Fi penetration testing to assess organizational security awareness.

Full Stack Development

Building IoT solutions and web applications using Next.js, MongoDB, Node.js, and modern frameworks.

Technical Leadership

Leading development teams and delivering hands-on cybersecurity demonstrations and training.

Education

B.Tech in Computer Science with Business Systems from VIT-AP University (2022-2026).

Professional Experience

My journey through cybersecurity analysis, full-stack development, and technical leadership in various projects and organizations.

Cyber Security Analyst - Technical Team

2023

Be a Nerd (VIT-AP Club)

Led cybersecurity initiatives and conducted security assessments for the technical team at VIT-AP University's premier tech club.

  • Conducted social engineering simulations to assess and improve organizational security awareness
  • Performed Wi-Fi penetration testing during workshops to identify and mitigate vulnerabilities in wireless networks
  • Delivered hands-on cybersecurity demonstrations to educate club members on best practices and emerging threats

Group Leader - Smart Hospital Appointment System

2023

Smart India Hackathon (VIT-AP)

Led a team to develop an innovative hospital appointment system with RFID integration and real-time tracking capabilities.

  • Developed RFID attendance and appointment system for seamless patient management
  • Built full stack application using Next.js, MongoDB, and Node.js
  • Implemented real-time tracking and notification features for enhanced user experience

Front End Developer

2023

Engineering Clinics (ECS, VIT-AP)

Developed IoT solutions and user interfaces for energy monitoring and management systems.

  • Developed an IoT solution to monitor and record real-time electricity consumption of individual appliances
  • Created detailed insights dashboard for efficient energy usage tracking
  • Designed seamless, user-friendly and dynamic UI for the Electro-Buck Project
  • Collaborated with team members to achieve project goals and deliverables
